data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of Promethis Pascoe (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae) on Hainan Island, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ba, Yi-Bin, Ren, Guo-Dong (2009): Taxonomy of Promethis Pascoe (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae) on Hainan Island, China. Zootaxa 2064: 27-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186907
